{{also|team}} ==German== ===Etymology=== {{PIE root|de|dewk}} Borrowed from {{bor|de|en|team}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/tiːm/}} * {{audio|de|De-Team.ogg|Audio}} ===Noun=== {{de-noun|n|Teams|Teams}} # [[team]] #* '''2010''', ''[[w:Der Spiegel|Der Spiegel]]'', issue [http://www.spiegel.de/spiegel/print/index-2010-5.html 5/2010], page 101: #*: Ein 20-köpfiges '''Team''' von Top-Bergsteigern aus Nepal will sich Ende April auf den Weg in die Gipfelregion des Mount Everest machen […] #*:: A team of 20 top mountain climbers from Nepal wants to head to the summit region of Mount Everest at the end of April, […] ====Declension==== {{de-decl-noun-n|s|s}} ====Derived terms==== * {{l|de|Teamgeist}} ===Further reading=== * {{R:Duden}}
